title: In residential buildings, Refuge chute / garbage chute may be provided with opening on each floor or on mid-landing
clause_text: In residential buildings, Refuge chute / garbage chute may be provided with opening on each floor or on mid-landing. Design and specifications of Refuge chute shall be in accordance with provisions of IS 6924. Architectural Projections may be allowed to the following extent.
